CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(QB_Internal_Status__c ), CASE( QB_Type__c, 'Purchase Order', QB_Purchase_Order_Status__c, 'Bill', IF( QB_Balance_Due__c> 0, IF(QB_Due_Date__c<TODAY() ,'Overdue','Open/Partial'), 'Paid' ), 'Vendor Credit', IF(QB_Balance_Due__c > 0, 'Unapplied', 'Closed'), 'Invalid' ), QB_Internal_Status__c )
CustomField.label: Status
